what_do_we_do: WE DEVELOP COMPLEX PROJECTS - SIMPLY. SHARING OUR TEAM
starter_info_one: Full design of your app with up to 15 pages
starter_info_two: Mobile app for both Android/IOS platforms
starter_info_three: Fully functioning features backed with Firebase and/or Custom backend
starter_info_four: Publishing apps to your or our App store and Play market
starter_info_five: One month free advertising in Google search ads or on Facebook/Instagram
starter_info_six: One month support after development finishes
premium_info_two: Full design of your app with up to 25 page
premium_info_three: Two months free advertisement on Search engines and social media
premium_info_four: Two months support after development finishes
custom_info_one: Creating Technical Requrements of your idea or system
custom_info_two: Creating complete designs of apps, websites and admin panes
custom_info_three: Automotization of your current business or implementation of your idea
custom_info_four: Implementing custom Admin panel for managing the whole system
custom_info_five: Coaching your staff and partners with the system that we built
mobile_app_info: We can create a customized e-commerce solution that fits your business needs and helps you increase your online sales.
cms_info: The process, best practices and technologies used are both proven and practical.
ui_ux_info: We focus on creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces (UI) and user experiences (UX) to ensure your website is easy to use and engages your audience.
website_info: We provide ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure your website stays up to date and secure, giving you peace of mind.
software_info: We can build customized software solutions that address your unique business needs and help you streamline your operations.
sem_info: Our SEM services include pay-per-click advertising campaigns and remarketing strategies to drive more traffic and conversions to your website.
about_us_info: “Empire Studio” shapes the future of market-leading brands. We transform outdated customer-facing software into pioneering, beautifully crafted solutions that lead the evolution of web technologies and exceed customer expectations. Contact us for trusted support to keep up with the tech and trends you need to modernise your core digital business.
design_process_info: Experience a seamless website creation journey with our streamlined design process. Our platform is tailored to ensure that you can effortlessly bring your vision to life, no matter your skill level. We are always eager to hear your thoughts and ideas. Share your feedback and suggestions with us, and together we can create the perfect website for you.
personalized_customization_info: Craft a distinctive online presence that reflects your unique style and personality. Our customizable templates and user-friendly tools empower you to create a website that showcases your individuality without any technical barriers. Take advantage of our versatile design features and make your website stand out from the crowd.
eco_conscious_info: Our team is dedicated to making a positive impact on the environment by minimizing our carbon footprint and promoting sustainable practices. By choosing to build your website with us, you are directly contributing to a greener future for our planet.
mobile_friendly_info: In today's digital landscape, mobile compatibility is key. Our platform ensures that your website looks great and functions smoothly on all devices, providing an optimal browsing experience for your visitors. Stay ahead of the curve with our mobile-responsive designs and tools.
robust_data_info: We take the security of your website and the privacy of your visitors very seriously. With over a decade of experience in the industry, we provide a reliable and secure solution that keeps your data safe. Rest easy knowing that your website and its data are protected by our state-of-the-art security measures.
attentive_customer_info: Our dedicated customer support team is here to help you every step of the way. We believe in providing personalized, human assistance to ensure your website's success. When you create a website with us, you can count on our friendly and knowledgeable staff to guide you through the process and address any concerns you may have.
discovery_info: We start our projects by understanding the scope and requirements. This is accomplished by working closely with you to make sure we are all on the same page.
plan_info: Following the initial kick-off meeting, we will outline your project, create milestones, and agree on project priorities.
execute_info: The final design takes shape and, at this stage, the idea comes to life representing the visual concepts.
deliver_info: Review and testing takes place, which ensures the quality of your project.
thank_you: Thank you for contacting. We will reach you soon!
